CommandUIHandler.CommandAction: javascript:function openDialog() {var options = {url: ctx.HttpRoot + '/_layouts/CrowCanyon.AdvancedPrint/ViewPrint.aspx?List={ListId}', width:800,height: 565,title:'CrowCanyon Advanced Print Pro'};SP.UI.ModalDialog.commonModalDialogOpen(options.url, options, null, null);};openDialog();

UrlAction.Url: javascript:function openDialog(){var options = {url: ctx.HttpRoot + '/_layouts/CrowCanyon.AdvancedPrint/PrintView.aspx?List={ListId}&ID={ItemId}&Type=EditControlBlockButton&SiteUrl={SiteUrl}', title:'Print',allowMaximize: true,showClose: true,width:550};SP.UI.ModalDialog.commonModalDialogOpen(options.url, options, null, null);};openDialog();
